comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
The CWGC has this:

JONES, STUART KIRBY

Rank: Lieutenant
Date of Death:  18/09/1914
Age: 25
Regiment/Service: Army Veterinary Corps attd. 25th Bde. Royal Field Artillery
Grave Reference 1. 1.
Cemetery LES GONARDS CEMETERY, VERSAILLES
Additional Information:
Son of William and Alexandrina Jones. Bom at Wavertree, Liverpool. Graduate of Liverpool University. M.R C.V S.

comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content: In 1901, Stuart, aged 12, born Wavertree, Liverpool, lived at 53 Borrowdale Road, Wavertree,  Liverpool with his father - William, aged 51, born Bagilt, Flintshire, dentist, druggist and chemist, his mother - Alexandrina, aged 51, born Liverpool and his siblings - Edward R, aged 23, born Wavertree, grain merchant, George M, aged 21, born Wavertree, fruit broker, Harriet A, aged 20, born Wavertree, secretary to dentist, and William B G, aged 14, born Wavertree.

comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content: In 1911, Stuart, aged 22, was boarding at Pensarn, Abergele, Denbighshire, Wales - he was an unmarried veternary student.
